headline: Has LyondellBasell (LYB) Fallen Too Far After Prolonged Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether LyondellBasell Industries' current share price really reflects its underlying value, you are not alone. That is exactly what this article will unpack. The stock last closed at US$45.59, with returns of 4.4% over the past week and 5.2% over the past month, while the 1 year return sits at a 32.2% decline and the 3 year and 5 year returns are 39.1% and 35.4% declines respectively. Recent market attention on LyondellBasell has been shaped by ongoing sector wide...

headline: Will LYB’s Expected Q4 Earnings Drop Reframe LyondellBasell’s Longer-Term Investment Narrative?
summary: LyondellBasell Industries recently announced it will release its fourth-quarter 2025 financial results on January 30, 2026, followed by a webcast and teleconference hosted by its head of investor relations, with supporting presentation materials made available online. This upcoming report comes as analysts forecast a double-digit decline in earnings and maintain a cautious "Hold" stance amid ongoing challenges in chemicals and petrochemicals markets. We’ll now examine how the anticipated...
